chapters.title: Ravens
chapters.info: Brandelwyn (Bran) al'Vere, p. 7 [12]—Mayor of Emond's Field and innkeeper of the Winespring Inn. He is the father of five girls, including Egwene. He has a large girth, about double of anyone else, and a fringe of thinning gray hair. He is known around town as being very stubborn, and not someone to be trifled with. See also al'Vere, Alene; al'Vere, Berowyn; al'Vere, Egwene; al'Vere, Elisa; al'Vere, Loise; al'Vere, Marin.
